snippet: The consolidation of more than 80 lawsuits against General Motors into a single proceeding in Manhattan represents a small but meaningful victory for the automaker.
abstract: Panel of federal judges hands General Motors modest but meaningful victory, consolidating pretrial phase of more than 80 lawsuits against company into single proceeding in Manhattan, venue sought by automaker; cases are on behalf of owners of cars recalled for defective ignition switch

byline.original: By HILARY STOUT and BILL VLASIC

lead_paragraph: The consolidation of more than 80 lawsuits against General Motors into a single proceeding in Manhattan represents a small but meaningful victory for the automaker.

headline.main: G.M. Suits Will Proceed as One Case in New York
headline.print_headline: G.M. Suits Will Proceed as One Case in New York
